this_title: Great Escapes with Morgan Freeman Season 2
trans_title: 摩根·弗里曼的大逃亡 第二季
History's Greatest Escapes with Morgan Freeman
モーガン・フリーマンの華麗なる脱獄
摩根·費里曼之越獄風雲
introduction: In the new season of “History’s Greatest Escapes with Morgan Freeman,” Oscar-winning actor Morgan Freeman explores real life prison breaks that captured the attention of the public as well as the authorities that tried to prevent them. Famous escapes at Devil’s Island, during the Vietnam War, and at Sobibor Death Camp during WWII, as well as other prison locations, are recreated to place Freeman at the site of the action. The series creates an up-close-and-personal view of what the prisoners are faced with in executing their break outs along with interviews from some of the prisoners themselves, their families, their cell mates and the guards and prison employees involved in each case.S2 E1 Fleeing ParchmanS2 E2 Vietnam POW EscapeS2 E3 San Quentin BreakoutS2 E4 The Sobibor RevoltS2 E5 Escaping Devil's IslandS2 E6 Alton City EscapeS2 E7 Tunneling to FreedomS2 E8 Breakout in Plain Sight
chinese_title: 摩根·弗里曼的大逃亡 第二季
foreign_title: Great Escapes with Morgan Freeman Season 2
